summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Corliss Avenue from North 36th Street to North 40th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, all in accordance with Resolution No. of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
